description: Group project involving critical assessment of media coverage of cancer research compared to scientific literature. Includes a 2000-word written report and mixed media presentation. Peer assessment contributes to marks.
1-hour closed-book exam with objective items (MCQs) and short-answer questions covering Weeks 1-5 content. Conducted via Inspera platform.
Four short online quizzes completed individually and collaboratively with tutorial groups. Covers current course material with 50% marks from individual attempts and 50% from team attempts.
2-hour closed-book written exam with objective items (MCQs) and short-answer questions covering all course content. Conducted via Inspera platform during UNSW examination period.
